message.body: I think it's worth a try--that's what I'll plan on. Should I contact lauren or have you?
If you could contact lauren that would be great...I'm going to email the contact, I'll cc both of you and give her your cell #s as well

I haven't heard anything back from sterling yet...but the other schools are still a go, so I'm thinking that will probably also be the case with the middle school. I'll let you know once I find anything out!
